# toggleToolbarShown(_:)

**Instance Method**

Toggles the visibility of the window’s toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func toggleToolbarShown(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The message’s sender.

## Discussion

See the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] class description for additional information.

## Managing Toolbars

- **toolbar**: The window’s toolbar.
- **runToolbarCustomizationPalette(_:)**: Presents the toolbar customization user interface.
